text: Nice brown color, minimal head. Aroma is full of bacon, smoked pork, a bit of sweet malts and even some maturated cheese. Taste is nice and balanced, the smoked meat flavors are not so punchy as in the smell, theres some spiciness combined with the sweetness of the malts. Medium body, medium carbonation. Overall, its a nice product.
Bottle at Edelweiss German Restaurant. Dark brown with big head and nice kacing. Smells like smoked sausage or smoked gouda. Roasty and smoked flavor. Lighter bodied than I would have thought.

500 bottle. Pours dark-reddish brown with a full, frothy off-white head, slight lacing. Generous bacon and smoke aromas. Deep malty flavors, nuts (smoked almonds), light sweetness toward the finish before turning back to lingering smokey notes. Medium bodied, silly texture. Not necessarily a daily driver, but a delicious beer.
Barwa bursztynowa, ciemna, klarowne. W zapachu szynka, żelazo, karmel. W smaku podobnie. Lekka kawskowość, wytrawne.
0,5 l Flasche. Sehr rauchiges Aroma, schmeckt dann sehr rauchig, malzig, bitter.

It was with some trepidation that I opened this beer. I've tried smoked beers before and hadn't really like them that much. This one pours a dark ruby/brown colour with some soft carbonation and little head. Smokey aroma of charcoal. The flavour in smokey malts and surprisingly a little sweet. Smooth, silky body. Pleasantly surprised, I rather like this beer and it is easy drinking.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Pours clear, very dark amber. Tan head. Aroma is primarly smoke, something like smoked meat. Rather sweet, though the smokiness cuts that considerably. Medium-full body.

Strong lovely smokey aroma. Clear dark red with not much head. The flavor is mostly very sweet and silky, with the smoke as an undertone, and a hint of oak. Its like good beef jerky or barbecue sauce. Smooth bodied.

15/20 a remarkable beer, tastes like smokey bacon and really easy to drink at 5.1%. A must try

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

my first smoke beer, and it doesnt disappoint!

Nose: Smoke ham and a delicious one! Some roasted malt, coffee

Taste: again smoke ham! Roast malt (sourish) coffee. Medium thin bodied

Aftertaste: Medium long
Greetings from Bydgoszcz, Poland to all Beer Geeks and Hopheads around the world!

Bruin/karmijnrood bier met weinig wit schuim. Geur: gerookte ham, Filet dAnvers, champignons, leder. Smaak: moutzoetig, rook, terug gerookte ham en een bittertje voor de mooie balans. Goede koolzuurprikkel. Medium volmondig. Veel, smaak voor 5,1% vol. Alc. Of je het nu thuis drinkt of in Bamberg het blijft even lekker. Ok, ik ben fan. Meer dan één pint mag!
Na zdrowie, Salud, Kampai, Prost, Skaal, Zivjeli, Fenékig, На здоровь& Na zdravi

Botella en 99 cervezas.

Vierte en color castaño-rojizo oscuro, brillante y transparente, con una buena generación de espuma.

Muy intensa en nariz, da notas muy marcadas de madera ahumada, turba y chimenea. También caramelo.

De entre los sabores básicos destaca el dulce, así como algo de salado y de ácido, aportando finalmente un amargor muy suave y algo astringente que va creciendo. El retro-gusto da notas de caramelo y café y produce un fuerte recuerdo de comidas ahumadas que hayamos podido tomar en el pasado.

De cuerpo ligero-medio y carácter refrescante. El postgusto es muy largo con presencia permanente de un ahumado muy agradable, acompañado de un amargor muy suave y algo astringente.

Un conjunto que inicialmente perece chocante pero que después de tres sorbos resulta muy agradable e invita a seguir bebiendo. Muy equilibrada. Imprescindible probarla.

Boca 0,5L - za ovo pivo kau ili ga oboava ili ga ne podnosi...prvo kuanje je bilo takvo da sam ga od muke jedva popio, bilo mi je odvratno međutim odlučio sam mu dati jo jednu priliku i tada mi je leglo savreno i kako ga pijem sve mi je bolje i bolje!!

Ar: Smoke--rich, oily, and a bit ashy. Ap: Deep amber brown, clear; large light tan head with moderate retention, leaving a film along the glass sides as it recedes to a somewhat lose and uneven cap of medium bubbles and suds. T: Toasty richness, with a massive overlay of smoke; the smoke is punchy and savory, with a refined campfire taste; medium-low sweetness, with a good dose of herbal hops and firm bitterness. P: Medium-full body, even and solid; carbonation is medium-high; dry finish. O: An excellent rauchbier marzen; refined and pronounced smoke couples excellently with the toasty, rich malt flavor of the beer.

4 mois après DLC. Brune reflets rougeâtres sans mousse, carbo moyenne. 1er nez whisky puis malté et herbes aromatiques type laurier/thym (?). En bouche on sent le fumé à gogo !!!! Final légèrement amère et très fumée, un peu vieux bois brûlé. Top ! Très particulière, extrême et très bien réalisée.
Wiedererkennungswert 100%!!! Ein wunderbar rauchiges Malzaroma mit einer geräucherten Krone.
Aroma e sabor muito agradáveis com fortes notas de café e da defumação. Cor preta e espuma marrom.

W aromacie dym, wędzonka, ognisko, nawet lekkie nuty torfowe, bardzo intensywnie. W wyglądzie brąz wpadający w czerń, obrączka beżowej piany, zdobi szkło. W smaku wędzonka, nuty oscypka, wędzonej szynki, trochę też torfu. Ciało średnie, całkiem pijalne, goryczka średnia. Ogólnie bardzo przyjemne w aromacie, solidne w smaku, dobre wędzone piwo.
Enjoyed this one. Loads of peaty smoke aromas, flavour is smoke, banana, some clove. Light bodied and easy drinking. Lovely.

Smells overwhelmingly of smoke and peat, tastes the same. Not overly carbonated but a lovely dark copper colour with slight head. 
Unique and rather good.
Klart rødbrunt med hvitt skum. Intens duft og smak av røkt kjøtt. Veldig lettdrikkelig.

roasty, smoked malty aroma, ruby, clear, 
medium bitterness, full body, oily feel, roasted sweet malt, smojed bitter finish

500 ml bottle. Pours a clear dark red-brown with a beige head. The aroma is very smoky, bacon, ash, strongly roasted coffee. Medium body with a soft carbonation, a light sweetness and a light bitterness. The flavor is malty, caramel, smoked grain, honey, hints of apples and again with a lot of smoke and bacon.

Butelka 0,5 z datą ważności do 05.2017.  BARWA: jasno brunatne, klarowne. PIANA: obfita, kremowa, jasno beżowa, trwała, ładny lacing.AROMAT: bardzo przyjemna bukowa wędzonka przypominająca wędzoną szynkę, bekon, momentami nawet nuty kojarzą ce się z  oscypekiem z grilla. Naprawdę przyjemny ,stonowany i trwały aromat. SMAK: podobnie jak w aromacie ale delikatnej, można wyczuć słodowość pod palonością i delikatnie popiołowym finiszem. Wysycenie średnie do niskiego, gładkie, średnio pełne, pijalne.

Appearance - black, 

Aroma - bacon-esque smokiness.

Taste - ashtray.

Palate - didnt pay too much attention as I was too preoccupied with finding it disgusting.

Overall - the bacon-esque smokiness promise something interesting, but it turns out to just be ashtray. I really, really disliked it, and the only reason Im semi-glad that I tasted it is so I know now how your archetypical rauchbier tastes and that I should pass them on.

Aroma: smoked like ham or bacon.
Appearance: brown, clear with thick light brown head.
Taste: malt, smoked, a light sweetness in start and small bitterness in finish.
Palate: medium body, light carbonation, smooth.
16.9 oz bottle pours black with a tan head. Aroma of smoke, caramel and some floral notes. Taste is smoky, malty and toffee.

UPDATED: APR 14, 2017 Achetée au E-Center en Allemagne. Bière très foncée. Un nez de salée et fumé comme du lard. Ça sent aussi le grillé. En bouche le grillé ressort plus. Goût très complexe. Bière étonnante. Une première pour moi. Mais plutôt agréable à déguster.

Bottle with expiry 04/2017. Dark brown colour, nice frothy head that stays long, Aroma is smoked - more bonfire, less ham, overall not very aggressive; also caramel. Light bitterness, light sweetness. Good.
Un ottima birra, aroma di malti tostati e affumicato, al palato rispetta benissimo laroma con una facilità di bevuta ottima. Consigliatissima.

Aroma: pilsner backbone, supported and perfectly blended with smoked, munich?, and spicy, floral earthy hop profile. Finish is slightly dry, gentle bitter. Hop bitterness is moderate, body is moderate medium, texture smooth, carbonation is moderate medium.

500 ml bottle. Clear brown ruby brew. 2 finger off-white thick head. Stays. Nice lacing. Aroma: intense prune, smoked sausages & cheese, bacon, resin, bonfire.
Flavour: smoke, barbeque; caramel, dried fruits, sweetish alcohol touch. Very lagerish mild bitter finish.
Bottle at La Micro Sabadell. Dark brown with vanishing whiteish head. Strong persistent barbecue smoked wood aroma. Starts sweet but changes rapidly to mild bitter taste.

Tasted bottled @LaMicro. Dark brown with thin white head. Aroma of smoked fish. Taste of smoked wood and liquorice.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Aromas a humedad y ahumado
Buen aspecto caoba transparente con espuma persistente
En boca seca y ahumada, levemente caramelo tostado y regaliz

Bottle from The Cave, Glasgow. Beer served in 12°C, Nonik Glass. Intense aroma of smoke (smoked ham or cheese), pumpernickel bread, ash. Taste is smooth, quite sweet malt, well balanced with rich smokiness. I wish to drink it again someday near to bonfire with some pork sausages.
50cl bottle offerte par des amis de Bamberg. Belle robe foncée. On est sur du bacon grillé. Très fumé et tourbé.
Beautiful dark copper brown, big off white head. Aroma is intense smoke, then rich malt. Taste is sweetly malty, notes of smoke, light cocoa. Mouthful is surprisingly light, but quite smooth.
Probada en el club de cata Olut de Sabadell en botella aroma a beicon muy fumada

Aromat - intensywna wędzonka bukowa, trufle i pumpernikiel ze śliwką, nuta popiołu.
Czysty, lagerowy charakter. Przyjemnie słodowy i wędzony. Prosty, ale zarazem ciekawy. Goryczka średnio niska, lekko zalega.

Smells like bacon, and the local butchers when they are smoking meats for the week. Then like smoked cheeses. It evolved / changed and then came back to the start again. Wow! Not too strong, but wow! Taste was nutty and sweet. Palate was cleansing and the smoke was mostly on the nose and not on the tongue. Went well with pork spare ribs. Wont be a staple of mine, but will be for had again for novelty value or for the right meal. 
But the Aroma - Wow!

500 ml bottle served in mug. Dark brown and red colour, beige fluffy head. Roasted and burnt malt, smoke, coffee and caramel aroma. Bitter-sweet and very balanced. Soft carbonated, full body. Smoky finish. Nice!

Bière sombre fumée
Larôme fumé est présent tant au nez quau gout.
 très agréable

Bebida en vaso a partir de botella de 50 cl.
Una cerveza espectacular, pero sobre todo original. Muy diferente a cualquier cosa que haya probado antes.
En cuanto a su aroma, es potente y esta cerca de rozar la perfección. Es ahumado que en momentos recuerda al bacon, salmón ahumado e incluso café.
Su apariencia es oscura, casi color café, con algunas ligeras notas rubí y una densa y espesa corona de espuma color beige que se mantiene constante durante toda la toma.
Es sabor es muy particular y va en consonancia con su aroma. Poderoso y ahumado.
Para terminar, su paladar está a una gran altura y deja notas de café.
user_location: Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, SPAIN

text: Bottle 50 cl. Pours a very dark opaque with a small white head and an aroma of toffee, smoked eel, roasted malt, raisin, dough and bacon. The taste is medium sweet and very smokey, this is a really nice smoked beer!

Bottle with wptully in cologne germany. Cola color with coffee like look. Off white head. Smoke aroma with a little bit of the sea. Almost smoked raisin. Very smoky taste. Almost a smoked fish taste. Some scotch ale taste. Lighter and less sweet than expected . Smoke it if you got it.

Aroma: Wooden smoke
Appearance: Dark brown color with clear liquid and tann head.
Taste: Heavy bitterness
Palate: Full body with a creamy texture, soft carbonation and a smoked long finish
Overall: Surprise for the senses; it has been my first smoked beer and it is REALLY smoked. I like it a lot (of course it goes really good with a smoked cheese but an old cheddar is nice too with this beer).
Bottle at home. Pours black with medium sized beige head. Aroma is smoked ham, malts and caramel. Taste has smoke, ham and roasted malts. Great beer.

Bottle. Aroma- strong smokiness (mainly ham rather than wood). Dark copper, clear, with a nice, beige head and good-looking lacing. In the taste, smoky notes are balanced with a typical Marzen ones- light caramel and bread. Medium-low, herbal-earthy bitterness in the aftertaste, combined with delicate roastiness. Medium-low-bodied, with a medium carbonation. Tasty beer.

500 ml bottle. Pours very dark ruby, off-white head. Aroma of intense smokiness in the kind body smoked ham and wood. Wonderful. Taste is medium sweet, low bitterness; flavors of smoked ham, slight smoked wood, slight smoked malt. Medium to full body, slick texture, average to high carbonation. What can I say, just another stellar smoked brew by Schlenkerla.

Really like this beer. Smokey aroma. Black appearance and good head (from the bottled version). 

However, lovely taste - medium sweetness, slight bitterness, smokey. Great balance to it - the smokiness is distinctive but not overpowering. Nice long finish and a good body.

Pleasant aroma of smoked bacon with some wooden barrel background. Clear dark brown in the glass with minimal head, but lacing is still noticeable. Taste is especially malty with woody smokiness which senses the palate. Bit of caramelized sugar and some roastiness. Nice one, not overhealmed with smokiness.

Butelka 500ml. pite w domu. Kolor brązowy, klarowne, piękna gęsta, drobnopęcherzykowa piana bardzo ładnie osiadająca na szkle. Aromat wędzonki w całym pomieszczeniu już po otwarciu butelki , słody i boczek. W smaku trochę palonych słodów, łagodne na podniebieniu, suszone owoce, śliwki. Słodycz z lekką goryczą, doskonałe piwo.

500 ml bottle.
A distinct smoky flavour and aroma that brings notes of smoked ham and smoked sausages. An earthy bitterness there is to be found that together with the smoky flavour really gives this beer a punch to it. Its also rather sweet and while being very drinkable the taste lasts a long time in your mouth. Light to medium body but packed with flavour. A favourite of mine.

0,5l bottle. Clear dark copper/brown colour with slowly shrinking big foamy off-white head. Aroma: Smokey ham with hiding caramel notes. Taste: Very intense smokey start, maybe the smokiest from Bamberg and has the most bitter mouthfeel. Medium body with medium carbonation. Medium lasting bitter (and smokey) finish. A very good smoked beer and really has the strongest smokey caracter but not as smooth as the urbock.

Dark brown, clear, small beige head. Smells smoked bacon, wood, a bit of alcohol. Medium to light body, smoky notes (not as strong as in the aroma), light bitterness at the end. Good balance and quite refreshing, but i wish it could be more dense.

Bottle at Youth Hostel Nuremburg. A great, classic smoked beer. Slight bacon flavour but much less potent than other (admittedly better beers like Weird Beard Smoke). This is a deeply malty drink but very drinkable (although filling taste wise).

8. 2. 2017, Ljubljana. Bottled. Strong aroma of smoked malts and unique taste. Dark brown medium to full bodied mouthfull with medium but not lasting head. Interesting beer.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
50cl bottle. Clear dark brown with a nice off-white head. Smoke, roasted malts and molasses. Smokey taste. Good.

The beer looks nice. Different than I expected. The beer is quite dark. The color of the beer is nice dark coppery reddish brown. The beer is perfectly clear. On top of the beer a nice thick layer of soft, fluffy brownish foam is formed. The bulk of the foam collapses quickly, leaving a nice thick creamy drape. Nice.
The smell of the beer is delicious. It is a true smoke beer. There is a nice little sour twist to the smoke, besides the nice delicate but firm bitterness. Even though the smoke smell of the beer is strong, it is not unbalanced. Besides the smoke there is a nice malty sweeter aroma and also some nice hops. The smell of the beer is good. It is balanced, full of different aromas. Very pure, real smoke.
The taste is also good. It is not that intense as the smell. Te smoke is there, but milder. It has that same bitter ands slightly sour twist. There is also a touch of liquorice. Malty sweets and some hoppy bitters are also present. It is nice and balanced. I like it, i like this style of beer in general. 
The palate is good. Medium body, nice and smooth and medium carbonation. The finish is nice. It isnt that long, but filled with nice smokey and bitter flavours. I like it, a very good one.
Sorprendente cerveza con olores a ahumados, pero respetando el paladar, con mucho cuerpo y equilibrada.

Alko Helnsiki 500ml bottle. Temperature 8C. Pours clean dark brown. Medium beige head with good retention. Smells smokey roasted malts, reminds smoked bacon. Taste roasted malts, molasses, aftertaste sweet and linger bitter. Excellent beer !
UPDATED: MAR 23, 2017 Backlog. Przenoszenie ocen z innego serwisu, z czasów przed założeniem konta na ratebeer

A füstös sörök megosztóak. Valaki szereti, valaki nem. Jómagam is amikor ittam, akkor igazi falusi hangulatba kerültem. Kolbászra, szalonnára asszociáltam. Különlegességnek megfelel, de max pár havonta iszok majd ilyen sört.

Bottle, 0.5l. Pours a clear dark ruby body with two finger creamy beige head. OK head retention and lacing. Smell is nice, burned malts, caramel, touch of smoke. Interesting bacon flavor in the background.

Medium body with average to high carbonation. Smooth texture, nice on the tongue. Moderately bitter taste. Aroma very interesting, quite weird at first. Smoked bacon and charcoal dominate the palate. Woody. Strong grain presence in the background. Lovely smoky aftertaste and mouthfeel. Slight metallic acidity. Regular finish.

Overall, interesting beer to try. Not something Id drink every day, but quite nice nonetheless.
Savuinen aromi, ei niinkään vahvasti maussa mutta silti läsnä. Maukas ja helposti juotava.
UPDATED: MAR 3, 2017 very unique cult beer. i like this meat, bbq taste, but its not a refresher.
point for the special Appearance of beer, you cant simply drink full glass of it, tones of bacon, salami, caramel, in aroma i felt light tones of reisins

Bottle. Pours dark brown with rather small off-white head that dissipates quickly, leaving just a small rim with minimal lacing. Nice, fully developed smokey aroma, resembles smoked bacon, with hints of molasses. Similar moderate to strong smokey aroma (bacon, sausage) with touch of charcoal, molasses and ripe dark fruits. Medium bodied, creamy texture with soft to medium carbonation and smokey aftertaste. Very good.
Super smokyness, super drinkability. This is a fantastic beer, with less malt than the urbok

Kolor brązowo- czerwony, klarowne. Piana beżowa, drobna, bardzo obfita. W aromacie wyraźna wędzoność, są nuty tytoniowe. Trochę nut ziemistych. 
Przypomina w aromacie stare, nasycone impregnatami drewno. 
W smaku lekko drewniane, znów mocna wędzonka. 
Delikatna słodycz w smaku, ale też trochę goryczki. 
Świetne piwo.

Pours a rich brown from a bottle. Aroma of wood smoke and chocolate, a hint of tobacco. Similar flavor, a bit of smoked meat. I must have a cold I dont know about, its not terribly smoky. Good beer.
Draft. Small white head, dark red colour. Strong smoke aroma, even with traces of smoked sausage. Also, strong smoke taste, which slightly kills other tastes , but still above average smoke beer.

Aroma: toast, malt, a lot of smoke. Dark amber color, big solid head. Medium body, nuts and a little sweetness in the taste. It should have mode body in my opinion for such a strong aroma, but one of the best smoked beer anyway.

Na plus zas?uguje wygl?d, betonowa piana i ciemnorubinowa barwa, idealnie klarowne. Zapach to g?ównie dym, kie?basa i szynka, ale wychodz? te? melanoidy, chleb, rodzynki i odrobina pumpernikla. Pijano?? na bardzo wysokim poziomie: typowy dla wedzonki smak, przeplatajacy si? z porz?dnym marzenem. Nagazowane w punkt, pozostawia ?ci?gaj?cy posmak, przez co jest strasznie pijalne. Jak kto? lubi te klimaty, to koniecznie powinien si?gn?? po to piwo.

Bottle to stange
Consummation: Smoky, oaky, and malty.
Adjunct: I get bacon, bread, and currants; very dark, but clear amber with a three finger, creamy, tan head

A 500ml bottle with a best before date of May 2017. Poured into a Lost Abbey teku glass. It poured a clear dark amber colour with a two fingered tanned head that had decent retention and left nice lacing. Aromas are strong smokey, bacon, ham and toast. Tastes like smoked meats especially ham and charcoal-ly upfront before giving way to sweet-ish caramel malts and a touch of fruit. Creamy, medium bodied with moderate to low carbonation. Overall a very nice smoked beer with lovely smoked ham aromas and taste balanced with a touch of sweetness.

Drunked 2 times on Tap in Bamberg, and collected some bottles to drink at home.
The best way to drink this beer, is on tap at Sclenkerla. Something marvelous, one of the best ever I have drunk around the world. Bottle is good, but on Tap is more and more.
Smoked...absolutely wonderful

From the bottle at Langolo Blu, Rimini, Italy. Pours brilliant but dark brown, with very fine white foam. Aroma is smoked, but also dried figs. Body is tendentially light, worth some carbonation. Taste starts sweet, but then a well-persistent bitterness from the smoked barley comes up.

Bottle. Clear dark red beer with small off-white head. Smokey aroma of ham, bacon, wood, a bit toasted, with lighter notes of bread and cherry. Taste is medium sweet and light bitter, lots of smoke, bacon, wood, some bread, caramel. Medium body, oily texture, soft to average carbonation. A real classic - smokey, meaty, brings back campfire memories.

Brun, klar
Lukt: rök, chark, söt, syrlig, 
Smak: knäckebröd, rök, chark, metall, torkad frukt,

Pours dark amber brown with a small off white head. Aroma is big smoked malts and bacon with notes of molasses. Big smoked malt flavour up front with fruits, molasses and a charcoal finish. It has a med body with a good sweet bitter balance. A good winter beer.

500 ml bottle bought at Gorgeous Wine & Cigar in Yuen Long.
Looks: Clear deep amber brown colour; Two-finger head with crumpety off-white foam which lasts for 3 minutes; Excellent sticky lacing with fizzy carbonation.

Aroma: Very fragrant full smoked malt which can be smelt a foot away, with well-done bacon, toast, caramel, strong cherry, red fruits, floral, molasses, bread, lemon and fresh grass. Yum!

Taste: Close to medium sweet rich malt, with potent bacon smoke, moderate ash, light soot, caramel, burnt toast, floral, molasses, earth, strong dough, lemon, medium bitter hops and grass.

Body: Close to medium body; Dry and creamy palate.

Mouth Feel: Rich maltyness in a thick background, very creamy and chewy (nice!). Smokiness is potent but not overbearing, full of nice bacon, light ashes and bit sooty. Fairly toasty with lots of caramel. Flowery with good sweetness. Earthy doughty with lemon to round. Fantastic!

Hoppiness: Floral, lemon and fresh grass in nose. Earth, floral, lemon and grass. in taste; Bitterness is fairly strong for a lasting, medium astringent meaty malty finish.

After Taste: Fairly dry. Creamy, smoky and fairly bitter to mouth.

Comments: This got to be the template for how smoked beer should be done - good head and looks, Strong but lovely bacon smokey aroma, rich creamy maltyness of Maerzen with just the right amount of ashes and smokes. Fundamentally strong in all areas yet so pleasant to drink. What more can I say? A classic!

From the brewery. Pours a brownish color. Aroma filled with smoke, bacon and fire. Taste is surprisingly balanced caramel malt notes with an overpowering smiley finish. Amazing how much better this beer is at the source from the oak barrel than in the bottle. Classic and good. Most probably my favorite German traditional beer.

Pours a very dark brown with a moderate frothy off white head. Aromas of smoked ham, rye bread, leather, tobacco, soil. Taste is smoked with caramel tones and floral notes. Mouthfeel is light bodied with medium carbonation.
From barrel @ Bishops Arms Plaza. Dark reddish amber with a medium tan head. Malty and smokey tones. Malt, smoke, fruit and hops. Medium body with a nice bitter / smokey finish.

strong aroma - smoky in abundance (smoked plums, dried pears slightly moldy, burnt fruit wood), slightly burnt and dump straws, heavy smell of old wooden cask, burnt bacon, a bit of well roasted malt.
medium taste, well accentuated - burnt malt and fruit wood, burnt straws, a lot of smoke, emphasized and dominant, some tar, a bit of sweetness and caramel, tainted black fruits, some over cooked meat, a bit of bitterness.

very good beer!

Translucent cola brown color. Moderate rocky beige head. Big smoky malt aroma fills the room. Remiscent of cooking bacon. First sip is sweet roasted malt with smoky notes. Oaky with a touch of bitter hops. Some woody and maple syrup notes as well. The smokiness is there from the first sniff to the last sip. Quite impressive. A world class brew and the one of the best examples of the style.

Marrón rubí con transparencia, espuma baja con adherencia. Malta maltoso ahumado moderado alto, ésteres cárnicos, ahumado, carbón, jamón ahumado, arenque ahumado, lúpulo terroso moderado bajo.En boca malta maltoso ahumado moderado alto, ésteres a carne asada, chorizo ahumado, carbón, lúpulo terroso moderado, lúpulo de amargor bajo-nulo. Final maltoso ahumado prolongado sin astringencia, cuerpo medio-bajo.
leather, roasty, brown, tan foam, light sweetness, medium bitterness, lightly sour, medium body, creamy, lively, long finish,

#1032Bottle 0.5l. Deep amber to red-brown body, small beige head. Aroma of smoke, smoked meat, chimney. Taste is neutral, very slightly bitter. Again prominently smokiness, touch of caramel. Medium body, high carbonation. Very pleasant.

Amber brown color, with tan head. Smoked oak aroma. Amber dark brown color, clear. Bacon, oak, ham, and maple syrup flavor. Smoke is dominant but does not overpower base. Medium to thick palate, chewy biscuit and jerky. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle 0.5l. Clear, dark copper colored. AROMA- smoke, wood, smoked meat. FLAVOR- slightly sweet, lightly smoky tart, smoke, wood, red berries. Medium bodied. Very good.

Jedyne porównanie, jakie mam w zanadrzu, to "Dymy Marcowe". Chociaż Schlenkerla wydaje się być trochę mniej kwaśna i o bardziej czystym profilu. Dymy chyba mają bardziej natargane. 

Świetne piwo. Nie wiem, czy w tym stylu można coś lepiej.

UPDATED: JAN 8, 2017 Piwo barwy brązowej, klarowne, gęsta piana. Pachnie jak wędzona szynka. Smak słodowy, nuty wędzone. Piwo słodkie i dosyć pijalne chociaż nienajlżejsze, gładkie, kremowe. Można powiedzieć, że wręcz "puszyste" ;).
Dark brown with a little tanned foam, smoked and roasty aroma, low carbonization, light sour, no bitterness. Interesting taste!

I like everything about this beer. Smoking ham-dominated aroma coming from pitch black beer with light foaming. The taste is purely wheaty with a light touch of bitterness and spiciness. The ABV is well hidden. But its just TOO SWEET (as expected from wheat beer), which took away all my points for its taste (I am all about the taste of a beer)

Nothing else in aroma except smoke, maybe a malt somewhere in the background. Looks good, dark amber, nice solid head. Sweet with light bitterness. I usually don?t like smoked beer but this one is great.

Clear cobber colored with light brown head. Very smokey aroma of sausages but some sweet malty notes can be sensed behind the smoke. The taste has malty sweetness but is quite dominated by the smoke flavors resembling sausage and burnt bacon. Not much bitterness and no hop flavor. I really like it.
03.11.2016 at Café Abseits - Intense Scwarzwälder Schinken coming to the nose after pour. Same in taste. Malt and smoked ham with little caramel and a creamy full palate.
Poezja kiełbasy, ogniska i gładkości (to piwo jest wręcz tłuste). Dość pełne, aromatyczne i kapitalne piwo.

Color marrón oscuro, casi negro, opaco, con capa de espuma blanca de un dedo de grosor (no mucha retención). Carbonatación imperceptible. Aroma ahumado de aquí a Madrid. Me recuerda a bacon, me recuerda a salchichas ahumadas... Ahumado en general. No capto mucho más. El sabor sigue al aroma. Muy similar. Lo que encontré en nariz lo hallé también en boca. No veo demasiado matiz, y tampoco es una cerveza que disfrute especialmente, pero a veces tengo la capacidad de reconocer lo que es bueno pese a que no me atraiga especialmente. Y en este caso, es obvio que esta cerveza es más que buena. Que a mí me guste o me deje de gustar el estilo ahumado es lo de menos.
Bottle from Appellation Wines Dalry Road. Pours clear dark brown. Nose of, yup, smoked sausage, molasses, more smoke, roasted malts. Taste is savoury, toast, malty, toffee, even more smoke.

UPDATED: NOV 9, 2016 Draft at Strangeloves. Dark clear garnet red pour with a large start of tan foam. Thick impressive lace. Smoky Marzen with medium-dark bready malts. Moderately juicy dark citrus. Molasses. Buffalo hide. The smoke defines but there is some interesting glossy malt going on there
Røkt bacon. Maltig aroma. Dominerende maltsmak, uten å virke overdreven. Svak, men tydelig tilstedeværende røyksmak. Balanserende bitterhet.
Thick creamy head and dark clear brown appearence. Smoked taste and some coffee roast taste. A little bitter finish. Liked it.
Butelka. Aromat wędzonki, szynka. W smaku podobnie, spora wędzonka. Pijalne.
Пью второй раз. Первый раз не понял, чем восторг& Второй раз тоже. Ну да дымок, а убрать дым, пиво так себе.
Intense smoked notes, wood, meat, leather, mahogany with a good beige head, medium body, law/medium carbonation, caramel, roasted notes...a great smoked for the crippied.

Dark brown to copper. Medium carbonation. Intense smoke aroma, very malty caramel, touch of hops. Nice balance, though on the dry side. Smoke is not overbearing, despite its strength. The maltiness moderates it quite a bit. The smoke leaves a nice tingling sensation on the tongue. A nice bit of hops too. This was very nice.

Pours dark copper to brown with a nice, stable head. The aroma is smoked ham, campfire and sweet malts. The taste is a bit sweet, smoked ham, bacon, some woody and tobacco notes. The bitterness is medium, smoky, herbal and earthy, it leaves a long, pleasant, dry aftertaste. I really enjoyed this one.

Jasnozolta piana, szybko redukuje się do pierścienia. Barwa brązowa z czerwonymi przebłyskami. Intensywny mięsny wędzony aromat. W smaku również odczuwalna jest wędzonka, dodaje lekko słonawego posmaku. Poza tym chlebowość, słodowość ale i lekkość. Bardzo udane piwo

Keg @ Six North, Edinburgh. Pours brown, dark brown, slight red tinge, biggish tan head. Nose is smokey, its smoked bacon and smoked sausage, then right at the end of the smell its a slight sweet malty kicker. Taste is the same as the nose

Amsterdam Pubcrawl 2016, @Brecht, van fles. helder caramel bruin met volle bruine kraag. aroma van gerookte ham, mout. Smaken van de volle gerookte ham/mouten zijn dominant, bacon, ham, mout, redelijk tot volle body, zacht en glad, je moet even door de ham heen bijten maar de smaken zijn best ok

Belle brune translucide surmontée dune mousse ivoire et légère qui disparait assez rapidement. Au nez, cest une Schlenkerla ! Le parfum de malt fumé est intense et masque à peu près tout le reste. On se croirait dans une forêt de pins après un incendie, avec des arômes de résineux, de charbon, de pneu vulcanisé (et oui :!), de céréales passés à la flamme et bien sûr de charcuterie !... Mais derrière tout cela on décèle de belles odeurs de raisins secs, de pruneaux, de sucre candi, de caramel et de sirop dérable, voir de chocolat au lait. Mine de rien, ce nez est gourmand et invite à la dégustation. En bouche, la bière est souple, légère, la carbonatation est moyenne avec un alcool à peine perceptible, lamertume est équilibrée, et le final est très porté sur la tourbe et les végétaux avec une pointe de levure. Le fumé donne vraiment un goût proche du bacon, ce qui ne ravira pas les végétariens (profitez, ce sont des végétaux !) On retrouve aussi des arômes dagrumes au palet, avec des traces de mandarine et de citron. Après plusieurs gorgées, on saperçoit que cette bière est plus complexe quelle en a lair. Une bonne curiosité qui mérite quon sy intéresse, comme toutes les bières de la brasserie Heller . Bouteille 50cl, V&B Grenoble.

(Bottle)
Aroma:smoked malt,caramel,toffee.
Appearance:dark coppper color,medium-sized yellowish head.
Taste: sweet flavour of smoked malt ,caramel and bread slightly dry finish
Palate:medium body,medium carbonation.
Overall:Nice one.
Red brown with almost no light brown head. Aroma is ham, salt. Taste is coffee bitterness with again salt. More ham in the finish. I cant like it as a long year vegetarian. Ugh.

Clear brown color with beige head. Aroma has intense smoked notes, sweet malt and some bacon. Taste is really balanced. Sweet malt and earthy bitterness with some toasted smoky notes. Quite hearty but still easy to drink.
At schlenkerla, Is this the version from the cask at the brewpub? Dark brown beer, medium head. Aroma is smoky, but subtle and malts. Taste is the same, not bad.

Très originale. Nez fumé boisé. Couleur rousse brune. Mousse très sombre. Le goût est vraiment sur le malt fumé, tout en étant assez doux est subtilement sucré. Très bien réalisée, une belle bière très traditionnelle.

My first "smokebeer," so not sure what to expect coming into this. Not a big fan. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

1 pint 0.9 oz at Bavarian Grill Plano. Poured a dark brown with a tan head and beautiful lacing. Taste of smoke, ash with a finish of caramel malts and subtle noble hops. Well carbonated, medium body. Wow, fantastic smoked.
Great smoked beer. Really nice aroma, taste is a little watery but nonetheless it really fits the style and is greatly drinkable.

Brown pour with stable light brown foam. Aroma smoke, taste smoke, finish is acrid, long lasting smoke. I understand this is a classic style, but it is not for me. Unable to discern any characteristic other than pungent wood smoke in liquid form.

Piwo klarowne w kolorze brunatnym z biala drobnopecherzykowa piana. W aromacie intensywna szynka i kielbasa, dym i wedzone nim slody. W smaku rowniez bardzo wedzone aczkolwiek bez przesady co sprawia je bardzo pijalnym dla amatorow tego stylu. Wysycenie na poziomie srednim goryczka umiarkowana, troche nut ziemistych. Raczej wytrawne w odbiorze - trzeba koniecznie sprobowac tego klasyka!
Unique flavour and taste by all means. A living legend. You must drink it before you die.

Rubinröd med beiget skum. En behaglig doft av charkuterier ovanpå en fin maltbas. Smaken är sött maltig med mörkt bröd och en fin rökkaraktär av charkuterier och en bra avslutande beska. Fyllig munkänsla.

Pours a cloudy dark brown with a thin tan head. Sweet and smoky nose. Full on the palate with some acidity and astringency toward the middle through to the finish. Smoky beef jerky flavor. Smoky bitterness continues after the finish.

Bottle at the Arcade Tavern, Ipswich. Pours mahogany brown with a lasting beige head. Aroma is smokey, very much like a smoked cheese, malty, dark fruit, hint of chocolate. Medium sweetness, light bitterness, touch of sour. Medium body, sticky texture, average carbonation. Finish is dry and smokey, with a developing feel of chocolate rum cake? Not a style I usually choose, but this one I enjoyed.

500 mml bottle tasted on the 27/09/2016. Dark ruby colour with a low white head. Aroma is dominated by smoked malts, brown sugar and bacon. Taste is bacon, dark malts, smoked ham. Dry finish and oily texture. Next one please!

Originally rated on 12/11/08. I bought this one for its style, i checked the reviews first so i knew it was going to be decent, but i dont care much for smoked beer, so i wasnt expecting much, but to my surprise this was pretty good. Despite a vigorous pour there wasnt much head and very little lace. Dark brown body, amber when held up to light. Aroma was great, smoke (of course) but it was just right not too much or too little, also with some malt tones. Flavor was similar with a great smoke balance, reminicent of bacon, with malts in the back ground. It is an unusual style but this stuff was pretty good, and i wish i had another.

Shared 16.9 oz. bottle brought into Lunar Brewing Co. by the distributor rep, and poured to snifters showing a ruby highlighted, dark brown color, with a presentable layer of tan foam that reduced to a persistent ring, and dots & dashes of lacing. The nose was a distinct, but mellow dose of smoke & sausage, with some toasted malt, and a touch of sweetness. Medium bodied, with decent carbonation, the taste was similar notes, showcasing the German malts, and continued smoke that comingled with moderate, earthy bitterness, and dryness. A tasty blend of two favorite styles.

I have to recognize that this kind of beer is not my favourite. I drank it in Nürnberg with friends, in the old city, close to the castle. The body is brown and, thin foam, average carbonation. When you drank it the taste is really smocked like some trees that you burn or a kind of smocked sausage but the taste is really strong, hiding the malt and the hop.

This beer will always divide opinion due to its unique taste. Aroma of smoked meat that dominates the beer. If you cant deal with that, youll back away quickly. If you can persist, you may find it grows on you, especially if you let it warm up a little.

Thumbs up from me because its just so weird its good.

Piwo o miedzianej barwie, przechodzącej wręcz w czerwoną. Klarowne. Piana jest jasnopomarańczowa, a może nawet jasnobeżowa, obfita, puszysta, zbudowana z przeplatających się drobnych, małych i średnich oczek, jest trwała, po opadnięciu pozostawia ładny kożuch na powierzchni i efektownie zdobi ścianki. W aromacie zdecydowanie dominuje przyjemna, intensywna bukowa wędzonka, nuty mięsne, szynkowe, kiełbasiane, zapach dymu z wędzarni. W smaku wędzonka nadal wyraźna, ale już nieco słabsza, choć może inne cechy trochę ją łagodzą. Jest wyraźna, choć niewysoka, przyjemna, niezalegająca, ziołowa goryczka. Są melanoidyny, jest nuta opiekana. Jest odrobina karmelowości, ale piwo samo w sobie jest wytrawne, sprawia nawet wrażenie nieco wodnistego. Trochę pełni dodaje mu solidne nagazowanie, drobne i intensywnie musujące. Moje pierwsze piwo ze Schlenkerli zrobiło na mnie dobre, ale nie powalające na kolana wrażenie. Piwu jednak brakuje większej pełni, którą pewnie zaoferowałby Rauchbock, na którego będę polował.

Bottle from Specs. Very dark brown with ruby highlights and a tiny, fast retreating beige head. Aroma of smoke, charred wood, caramel and beef jerky. Taste is smoky and very slightly sweet. Dry with very soft carbonation; almost flat.
Pours brown with a tan head. Aroma is smoke, wood and dark malt. Taste is lightly sweet, lightly sour and medium bitter.

Bue en bouteille de 50cl au Kilarney
Couleur ambrée/cuivrée, petite mousse peu deffervescence
Nez sur le jambon et les herbes
Attaque jambon et saucisse de Morteau (côté fumé) avec une pointe de grain et avec une fin de bouche assez sèche avec tout ça elle est bien désaltérante.

Muthafukin huge sample thanks to Nielspikfjæs. Pours clear dark reddish brown with a big fluffy offwhite head. Aromas of smoked meat, peat, malt, nutty. Taste is smokey, meaty, malty, nutty, dusty, light fruity. I hate smoke, dont get this wrong. The beer is probably fine. If you like smoked meat in a beer, that is.

Una Smoked de color oscuro y baja carbonatacion. Su aroma ahumado es persistente (salmón ahumado) impidiendo la percepción de otro tipo de aromas. Su sabor conserva el tono ahumado, sin mucho cuerpo, con notas de madera y ceniza. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Smells like smoke. Clear brown liquid with white foam. Smoked, bacon and caramel aroma, Slick taste.

Pours deep, dark brown with a short, creamy, off-white head. Strong and delicious smoke aromas, predominantly bacon with a hint of caramel (?). The taste follows suit. Thick, hoppy and good carbonation. Slightly bitter aftertaste. Could have lasted a few more seconds... This is a world beater among other, truly exceptional Bamberger beers. Good, better, Bamberg.

The beer pours clear, dark copper colored with a one finger high head.

Nose: Boom! Turn out the fire! Here is a lot of smoke, campfire, ash, charcuterie (mostly bacon) and caramel malt. 
Taste: Smoked roasted malt, honey and bitter hops. 
Mouth: Medium body. Medium carbonation. Great balance between the sweetness and the bitterness. 

Tasty and easy drinking, like liquid bacon - A perfect beer?

Damn, this beer is a slap in the face.. crack one of these open and it can clear the room... Or at least a table. The aroma is just about the strongest thing I have ever smelled in a beer. A strong smoked aroma hits like a punch on the nose. Once you start drinking, it starts to become a bit less punchy, but the beer backs it up. A good, malty taste, slightly sweet but malty and exciting. Colour is a warm wort colour. I couldnt decide what to make of this beer at first, it will likely put many off with the craziness of its smoky bacon smell, but if you can get past that it is a treat and something to remember.

aroma is a heavy smoke with a powerful smell of bacon. the beer pours into a wonderful dark red topped with a creamy white head. the flavor isnt as strong as the aroma may hint at though it does have a recognizable smokey taste to it.

- intensive Aromen nach Malz und Rauch
- geschmacklich kommt dann noch eine gewisse Süße hinzu
- Kohlensäure ist für diese Art von Bier perfekt dosiert
- im Abgang wird es leider etwas nichtssagend
- im Ganzen gesehen hätte ich mir mehr Körper und Ausdruck
 gewünscht
Fazit: Diese Schlenkerla Biere sind m. E. überschätzt
UPDATED: AUG 25, 2016 Aroma of smoke and bacon. Malty backing and balanced. Bacon smoked meat in the taste. Very different but good. ---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle From bierlinie in Berlin. Pours maple syrup colored. Smells of Bacon From the black forest. Taste is spicy and smokey. Really smokey in the aftertaste. Full body. Hard to place, but fine beer to enjoy
UPDATED: OCT 4, 2016 W aromacie wędzonka mięsna, trochę wędzonego sera. W smaku przyjemna wędzonka ze słodkim tłem, alkohol idealnie zamaskowany. Genialne piwo.

500mL bottle. Pours a dark brownish amber with medium white head. Smoky aroma of charcoal, bacon, and roasted malts. Taste is much the same. Smooth finish. Low carbonation. Full mouthfeel. Fantastic beer.

Aroma dominated by smokiness reminding smoked cheese, smoked meat etc. In taste its fairly smoky with same traits as described in aroma, with malty, bready backbone. On palate its fairly light bodied with low carbonation. Amber, pure colour with lightly colored solid head with nice lacing.

The scent hit me before I even crossed the river. Smoke poured from the other side of the banks, a dark ruby colour bathing the landscape. My senses were overwhelmed, dominated by roasted, toasted malt. I was not prepared. Even as I walked away, the overwhelming power of the beer came with me. My soul was roasted, there is no turning back.

Bottle. Pours in dark ruby body with low white head. Aroma is smoky, malty, pretty clean. Taste has high smoke malty flavour with smoky aroma as well, pretty even palate. Body is medium, medium-low carbonation.
Шикарно& копчено& пиво, отличны& аромат и вкус, приятно& послевк& Очень рекомен&

Aromat szynki :) Do tego lekki chleb razowy, odrobina karmelu - po prostu świetnie się zapowiada. W smaku podobnie, jest bardzo czysto - słód, lekki karmel, mocna, słonawa wędzonka. W finiszu lekkie zioło od chmielu. Przepyszna wędzonka.

Pours a pretty thick brownish head and has a very dark amber appearance, a little bit clear. Even before pouring into glass, smokey aromas were quite obvious, kinda like that woodburnt smell. In actuality, it totally overpowers any other aroma I might get. Has good lacing. Mouthfeel slightly watery. Flavours right off the bat also has that smokeyness to it. Something like burnt roasted dark malts. Actually not offensive. Kind of reminds me of St Peters whisky beer, but better tasting. Theres hints of honey, even bacon, but pretty faint. Such an odd beer aroma/flavour wise but its pretty darn good.
Was für ein gutes Rauchbier! Schinken Schinken Schinken, dann kommt eine malzige süße und im Abgang ist wieder Schinken und ein Hauch Hopfen und Honig. Geil!
UPDATED: JUN 17, 2017 Аромат дыма, копчено& мяса, пьется легко. На розлив легче и менее приторн& чем в бутылке.

dark, almost black, similar to coffee. Form a durable layer of foam, creamier texture and color. It gives off an intense aroma of smoked, such as bacon or smoked cheese. After roasted malt notes something spicy and coffee are appreciated. It is such an intense and enveloping aroma, which is totally unmistakable. surprising and intoxicating taste.
predominantly strong smoky flavor, and in the background, slightly sweet roasted grain to malt, which gives way to a long aftertaste slightly bitter hops tempered by the lingering aroma of smoky flavor is appreciated. It has achieved a near perfect balance between sweetness and bitterness.
500ml bottle at Josh, vintage 2004. Aroma is still smoked (but not as so agressive as a fresh version), some fruity notes. Quite sweet taste with the same notes. Not bad :-)

Dark brown with a medium white head. Beautiful smoky aroma of bacon and smoked cheese. Sweet and malty in the palate, with a strong roasted and smoked malty backbone. Low bitterness and medium carbonation. Fantastic.

UPDATED: JUL 22, 2016 Butelka 0,5l. Obfita piana, ?adny lacing, klarowny bursztyn. Aromat przede wszystkim w?dzony, intensywna szynka, troszeczk? nut s?odowych. W smaku równie? w?dzonka, do?? s?odko, do?? wysoka pe?nia, delikatny karmel i chlebowo??. Posmak w?dzony i s?odowy. Goryczka niska, nasycenie umiarkowane. Bardzo dobre.

500ml at the Railway Station, Durham. Dark amber pour, with a pale yellow sea-froth head. Aroma of well-smoked bacon rind and bourbon. Flavours of age-old smoked bacon and acrid woodsmoke, with a faint note of old ale. Simple tastes, yet very flavoursome.

Deep red brown with a brown tinged head. Woody smell with a hint of smoke. Big smokey edging on peaty flavour with an earthy bitter finish. Smooth & bacony - yummy!

Rated by BrewTom
Tap @ Fermentoren. Pours dark with off white head. Smoke acompanied by more smoke and a hint of malts. Soft carbonation full body.

Kolor: ciemno miedziany, klarowny.
Piana: średnio obfita, drobnopęcherzykowa, dość wolno opada.
Zapach: intensywny aromat kiełbasianej wędzonki, dymu, dość wyraźne aromaty słodowe, ciemnych owoców, wędzonej śliwki, opiekane.
Smak: również intensywna wędzonka kiełbasiana, dym, trochę nut słodowych, ciemnych owoców, dość wyraźna goryczka.
Wysycenie: średnie.
Bottle. Deep mahogany colour, thick white head, looks great. Super smokey, hints of deep malt, smoke, smoked pork product. I always enjoy this but never really fancy another.

UPDATED: APR 5, 2017 Delicately smoked and pretty delcious. The smoke is not overpowering with bitter hops coming through. Wonderful scrumptious head that dissolves too quickly. A cracking beer with a lot of flavour for 5.1%
Aroma is like walking into a boat shed. Tar and smoke off course. Gets me in the mood for whisky. Sausage taste and nice cream. An exciting and surprising beer.
Brews n chews. Pours a darker brown. Big smokey meaty aromas. Taste is smokey with a nice sweetness in there too. Like liquid bacon.

Dark brown with wonderful reddish hints, soft and white big head, shows decent retention and low lacing. Aroma is strongly smoked (bacon, speck, slight ashes) among a subtle roastiness and some dark fruit notes. In the taste, smoke is less dominant in a perfect balance of sweetness (dark fruits, caramel), bitterness (roasted malts) and smokiness ((bacon, ashes). Leaves a nice mix of smoke and fruity sweetness in the aftertaste. Medium to light body with very low crispness. Splendid smooth but still slgihtly creamy, goes down so easy. Wonderful and highly satisfying.

16.9 ounce bottle. Pours a dark, hazy reddish brown with a thin beige head. Taste is of roasted malt, smoke, caramel and wood. Nice smoke and malt aroma. Has a smooth body with a smokey finish. Quite excellent.

500ml bottle at Brewhouse & Kitchen (Cheltenham). Pours dark brown with no head. Aroma is dominated by smokiness, some dried fruit. Flavour is fruity, smoky, caramel, quite sweet, only a touch bitter.
Bottle. Pours an dark amber color with cream head. Smoke, ham, wood, slim jim aromas. Smoke, sausage, ham, wood flavors. Classic rauchbier.

Piana obfita, piękna, kremowa. Kolor piwa brązowy. W aromacie przyjemna dawka dymu. Raczej średnie wysycenie i średnia pełnia. W smku raczej słaba goryczka i ponownie dym od drewna. Na pewno ciekawe marcowe, ale ogolnie to dość średnie
Aroma of peated salami & sweet malt. Clear red/brown with low tanned head. Lightly peated taste of fudge & lightly hoppy. Light body & lively carbonation.

From a 5year old bottle into a Chimay glass. Pours brown with head and lace. Aroma of liquid smoke, pulled pork, smoked wood. Light carbonation and significant mouthfeel. Flavors of burnt malts, molassas, minerals, slight liquid smoke, slight chocolate. Overall unique, flavorful, generally an aquired taste, but tasty for the style, well worth tasting after understanding what this is as a smoked brew. Amazingly potent after many years.
Bottle. Chestnut color, tan head. Aroma of smoke, cichorium. Taste is light bitter, light sweet. This beer is fresh, light, easy to drink. Very good.

From a 500ml bottle on 14/6/2016. Pours a very deep amber with a biggish head. The nose features smoke, bacon, ham and ash. All of these feature in the flavour, which is joined by some caramel, brown sugar and a little honey. Features a modest bitterness. The texture is slightly syrupy and the carbonation average. Very cohesive and well balanced. A delightful smoked beer.

Clear brown, nice head. Aroma: smokeyness, malt, caramel. Full body, medium to heavy sweetness, medium bitterness. Taste: at he beginning malty and appleish, but later smoke dominates till aftertaste. Some bitterness at the finish. Not much is happening, but theres everything that should be.
This was a real special experience. Drank it accompanying aspargus, which combined quite well. Was actually surprised how well the smoke flavour combines with food.

On tap @ Moeder Lambic - Color: dark brown beer with small carbonation and medium brown head. Smell: smoked malt. Smoked oak and smoked ham. Really well balanced. Wood notes. Taste: medium body with smoked malt. Good woody smoked and ham smoked. Very nice beer easy drinkable. Aftertaste: smoked.

Pours deep Ruby Brown with good beige head. Aroma is of smoke, similar to Islay whisky, and light malt, slight hint of toffee and something estery, maybe the yeast? Good carbonation and medium mouth feel. Taste smoky and Bready. Light bitterness and hint of herbal notes. Taste ends with almost evergreen mint phenols. An interesting beer, but not my typical style

Bottle at Taps Beer Bar, Changkat, Kuala Lumpur. Poured a clear dark brown with a frothy off white head. The aroma is light smoky BBQ, wood chips, The flavour is light roasty bitter light sweet malt with a light, watery, metallic hop, light roasty palate. Medium bodied with average carbonation. A bacon sandwich in a bottle. Smoky but not OTT. Just the way I like it!
UPDATED: JUN 2, 2016 0.5 l bottle. Dark brown color, no head. Overwhelming smoked bacon aroma, a bit weaker smoked taste. Just as a smoked should be. Nice brew.
Bottle at green sheep. Brown-mahagony colour with a small white head. Nose of cured meat, very slight soy sauce. Very nice smoke in the taste, bacon like. Creamy mouthfeel. Lovely.

UPDATED: MAY 26, 2017 0.5l bottle from kaisers in charlottenburg/wilmersdorfer arkaden. also from marktkauf/edeka, 1.59.
pours a clear deep chestnut with a steady beige head and a nice lacing. aroma of smoke, bacon, peat, whiskey, ash. flavour of smoke, bacon, bread. savoury, numbing and slightly salty. no bitterness.

UPDATED: SEP 17, 2016 Bottle. Another tasty smoked with tons of bacon. Salty but not greasy, sweet-ish, reminding a lot of smoked almond. Medium body, lively carbonation. Bitter aftertaste, dry. Decent malts in the background. Very nice! They say it takes a few Schlenkerla Rauchbiere to like - I guess that?s true! (8/4/8/4/15=3.9) 
Re-rate at the brewpub, wooden barrel. Oh boy. Is it the Holzfass, the fact that Im super excited to be here, or maybe that I had a bit of beer before? Whatever, I dont care, this has to go up in rating.

Bottle. Stunned to find it unrated. Nose is smoke, cheese, meat, hints of sweet malt. Taste is sweet malts, brown sugar, leading to smoke, meats and cheese, hint of soy and salt. 
 
Lighter and more refreshing than the Doppel, but still delivering on the smoke.
Bottle shared at Mrks. Clear red/brown/amber with creme head. Smoked ham, bacon, BBQ, sausage, peat, light ash. Light sweet, light bitter. Creamy malty feel. Unique taste, very lovely.

Bottle shared thanks to sjogro. Clear reddish brown with beige head. Smoked ham, charcoal, wood smoke, ash, caramel, wood, dried orange. Light sweet and bitter with smokey finish. Under medium bodied with soft carbonation. I dont like smoked beers but this is not that terrible actually.
UPDATED: MAY 14, 2016 Cerveja de coloração escura, com boa formação de espuma. Aroma de bacon, presunto defumado, típico do estilo. Sabor forte de defumado, excelente exemplar de rauch.
In bottle is good but nothing like taste it in bamberg. Thats the right way. Come.
UPDATED: APR 24, 2017 Smokey (bacon adn focal type) with hint of caramel. Medium to light body, lively carbonation, well balanced, easy drinkable.
Bei der Berlin Beer Academy. Mahagoni, rotbraune Farbe. Aroma, rauchrig, Bacon. Geschmack ebenso nach Rauch, Schokolade, Malz.
Súperpotente aroma ahumado. Color oscuro rojizo. Espuma abundante y duradera. Sabor ahumado, madera, ligero toque a lúpulo.
My first Rauchbier. Looks awesome. Aroma has a lot of smoke. Taste is good, smoke comes through at the end. Not bad!
White off some mokka coloured head, dark brown to black coloured body, smokey cole some malts smell, medium carbonation medium bitter malts some chocolat hints smokey taste a bit hazlenuts taste

F: off-white, not long lasting.
C: dark, non-transparent.
A: smoked malt, sausage, smoked bacon, mushrooms, roasted malt.
T: roasted malt, smoked meat, dark bread, woody, light to medium body, hint of salt, watery but very good worth to try, 0,25l from tap at Craft & Draft in Amsterdam.

Almost opaque dark brown color with a copper hue and faint activity. Light brown 2 finger head, lasting around 10 minutes, with average legs.

Aromas of bacon and smoked salmon on wood. Flavors of smoky meat, tobacco, roasted coffee, caramel, and herbal spices. Feels like bread mixed with wood and bacon. Well balanced between sweetness and bitterness.

Full body with prickly carbonation. Strong finish of medium length, ending with a spicy smoky meaty beef jerky feel, still with a nice balance from the sweet and sour.

Overall this is my first of this style and not really a fan. Incredible experience to try, yes, but is it a beer that I enjoy or would I drink it again, no. Still perfectly drinkable to the last drop with complex and interesting flavors. The smoky meaty bacon taste is overwhelming the other flavors. The body is flat and missing some freshness. Sure Im a bacon lover but not in my beer!
On tap from wooden barrel. Dark brown with one finger off white head. Nice smokey, bacon aroma. Flavor is very similar, smokiness comes out at the end.

Bottle. Poura is clear dark amber with medium beige creamy head that lasts for long time. Aroma of smoked malts, smoked cheese, plums, fruity touch. Taste is light bitter, dry, light fruity sweetnes, lot of smoke notes in tongue. Light to medium body, slick to creamy texture, very dry, coffee bittery finish.

Marrom clara, cristalina. Espuma bege fina, de curta duração. Aroma muito intenso de defumado, com notas de melado, ameixa, caramelo, e madeira, que se estendem ao sabor. Esse começa adocicado, vai a salgado e termina amargo. Pouco alcoólica e de pouco corpo.

Bottle. Pours a clear brown, coppery body with a medium light-tanned head. Moderate smokey aroma with some caramel and dried fruit. Taste is balanced, a slight bitterness. Notes of cured meat and somewhat complex maltyness. Clean and smokey. Medium-light body, avg co2.
I really disliked this. It smelled like smoked ham/turkey, tasted like a bad sandwich.
Aroma bem defumado. Corpo médio e amargor pronunciado casando perfeitamente com o defumado. Pede um aperitivo salgado junto. Umas das melhores que já tomei.

Monumentális, örökké tartó bézs hab, sötétbarna szín. Intenzív füstös illat, malátás alapon. Markánsan füstös ízű, de mögüle kiviláglik egy komlósan keserű, enyhén gyümölcsös test. Utóíze füstös, enyhén keserű és némileg gyümölcsös. Testes, de nem nehéz, egy komolyabb húsos kaja után ideális.
Very smokey flavor. No bitterness for dark beer. Tastes smokey and smooth. Paired well with whiskey.

W aromacie intensywna wędzonka, oscypkowa, szynkowa, w tle popiół, słodowość i karmel. Kolor ciemnobrązowy, klarowne. Piana drobnopęcherzykowa, średnio obfita, średnio trwała, lekki lacing. W smaku pełne, wędzonka na pierwszym planie, dalej suszone śliwki, lekka popiołowość. Goryczka średnia, wysycenie średnie. Kapitalne piwo.

pitch black with huge off-white head, a lot of smoke in the aroma, dark malts and more smoke and wood, tastes like bacon to start with, low sweetness, low to medium bitterness, roasted and smoked, gets better as you drink
On tap at La Cerveteca, Barcelona. Pours dark brown with light beige head. Aroma of smoke, chocolate, dark bread. Tastes slightly sweet, but well balanced. Medium bodied.
Cerveza ahumada. Cuerpo medio, aunque tiene una densidad aceitosa interesante. No es de sabor fuerte como otras ahumadas, más sutil. Muy buena.

Pours dark with a very short white head. I could not pick up any aroma due to a head cold but the taste, wow, reminds me of cleaning my fire place. Serious soot flavor that builds as you consume it, not a bad thing but I don't think I would not want a third bottle in one sitting. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Bottle @ Beerheadz. Very dark brown with a frothy off white head. Aroma of barbecued pork. Taste is sweet, smoky, savoury, a little caramel. Excellent

Aroma:

Malts, wood, smoke and hops.

Appearance:

Turbid/opaque ruby/black beer with a small/medium off-white/beige head.

Taste/Palate:

Slightly/medium sweet with malts, wood, smoke and hops.
Smoke. Ham. Forest. Strong body. Semi sweet. Single trick pony. Does the trick well.
Smokey and peaty aroma, which doesnt come as strongly in the taste. Simple overall.
Schon recht dunkel, klar. Geruch sehr rauchig aber noch gemäßigt. Im Geschmack wenig restsüß, dafür ein bisschen malzig. Zum Ende wieder Rauch. Trotz des Rauches recht rund.
Really liked the aroma. Full smokeyness of course, but in a delecate, complex fashion. The mouthfeel and taste I thought were a but thin though. So yeah, mainly an aroma thing I guess.
At my Home along with Yves dark brown black colored body with off white head and a roasted malt hops aroma a roasted malt hops herby bitter taste with a bitter finish

UPDATED: MAR 16, 2016 In bottiglia. Colore bruno/nero con riflessi cola. Schiuma colore bianco opaco/zucchero di canna, soapy, di rapida dissolvenza. Naso nettamente affumicato, di cuoio, speck e legno di faggio sotto brace. Carbonazione media, attiva e piacevole, che invoglia la beva e aiuta la buonissima scorrevolezza. Inconfondibile aroma di di malto, cuoio, speck, legno di faggio e torba, sensazione balsamica di cenere nel finale. Meraviglioso gusto dolce maltato affumicato poi leggermente amaro dove emerge la luppolatura. Corpo leggero, trama oleosa leggermente grassa, estremamente gustosa, fine maltatura. Una birra morbida, accessibile e beverina, realizzata magistralmente, con una perfetta dosatura degli elementi più gravi che conferiscono il carattere così famoso della birra in questione con gli elementi di base che più tradizionalmente la legano allo stile Marzen.

Shared with wim at his home. Brown colored beer with small white head and no carbonation. Smoked ham aroma. Full sparkling palate. Finish is mucca cappuccino smoked bitter.  ---Rated via Beer Buddy for Android

Poured from a 16 OZ bottle into a pint glass. The appearance is a clear reddish-brown body color with a medium sized tan head. The aroma is a smoke and malt. The taste is made up of smoke, malt and a little hint of hops.

Di colore marrone brillante evidenzia una discreta schiuma beige con grana abbastanza fine. Il naso è la sua arma vincente: un affumicato prepotente che accompagna dolci note di caramello e miele di castagno. In bocca è fluida con un gusto rotondo che richiama ancora fortemente l'affumicato e la castagna del prete.

Enorme lager ahumada de Bamberg, a la que más aprecio tengo de la fábrica. El aroma ahumado a brasas es apabullante, infinito. Puedes distinguir leves notas a maltas tostadas en segundo plano. De cuerpo ligero y trago seco, de nuevo ahumado y tostado.

La birra si presenta con schiuma beige con una breve persistenza.
All'esame visivo risulta di colore marrone, velato.
All'esame olfattivo il suo aroma è abbastanza intenso e si percepisce in modo netto l'aroma dell'affumicato.
All'esame gustativo il corpo risulta esile e si percepisce una certa sapidità e un gusto amaro, bruciato che rimane in bocca per un lungo periodo.
Nel complesso questa birra risulta armonica è abbastanza piacevole.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Oh my God! Amazing smoked aroma. It is like there is a steak in the bottle. Black color with beige head. Leaves smoked bacon aftertaste. Very good to excellent beer.

Pours dark brown body with a beige head. Aroma is roasted malts and grain, smells like roasted bacon. Tastes also like bacon and roasted malts. Soft bitter smoked finish. Medium body and a smooth texture. Average carbonation and a long aftertaste. Great beer for a great breakfast.

Bottle pours black with high foamy beige head. Aroma of burnt oak smoke. Tastes of the same with roast and some molasses. Sweetness in the middle finishes with a lingering bitterness. Good beer.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

UPDATED: MAR 4, 2016 Przepiękna wędzonka, aromaty wędzonego bekonu/szynki, takie przygaszone ognisko. W smaku dym, fajna nienachalna tekstura, nie męczy a wręcz zachęca. Doskonały przykład rauchbiera.

Bottle. Verging on black with a dirty brown head. Aromas of smoky bacon, forest floor, earth, mushroom, wood and smoke. Flavours of smoked small goods , molasses sweetness through the mid palate and roasty espresso bitterness to finish. Wonderful beer. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

500ml bottle pours a deep brown with tan head. Smoked bacon/ham on the nose with lovely deep woodsmoke. Has a really meaty smokiness to taste. Really good flavour. Full, almost oily, mouthfeel and a mild bitterness on the finish. Tasty stuff.
500ml bottle. Dark body with a tall head. Smoke, bready notes, caramel, smoked meat. Big mouthfeel without being sticky.
0,5l Flasche. Das Bier ist dunkelbraun, beiger flacher Schaum. Geruch nach kaltem Rauch. Geschmack Rauch, keine Süsse. Etwas metallisch im Abgang. Mir fehlt bei dem Bier was.
Wow this is the only Smoked beer Ive had, blows your socks off, could only have the one tho, so thick, tastes like bbq slightly burnt sausages brilliant!

Bottle of 50cl, in a pint glass, from the fridge.

Nothing more to say that the presentation didnt : its a perfect smoked beer.

Bardzo drobna, bujna piana. Opada, znacząc szkło. W aromacie bardzo intensywna wędzonka. Smakuje jakbym wgryzał się w wiejską kiełbasę. Oprócz tego, lekka słodowa słodycz. Wraz z ogrzaniem wychodzi bardziej drewniana wędzonka. Klasyka gatunku

0,5l bottle from alko. Foamy tanned head, black liquid. Aroma is smoked meat, little bit of roasted malts. Light sweetness, medium bitterness. First smoked beer I have ever tasted, really good with food.

bottle @ DØE Køge. Appearance: pours clear copper-red with powerful creamy beige head and lacing. aroma/taste: bread, light caramel, oak and smoke. palette strong malty and smoky aroma, average carbonation, medium body, medium to notable sweetness, somewhat balanced by an average bitterness, medium duration and a watery texture. Overall: distinct smoke that overpowers the other aspect a bit.

(Tap at Fermentoren Aarhus)
Deep red body with a white head.
Aroma and flavour of campfire, smoked sausage and malt. Light sweetness and bitterness. 
Medium body with average carbonation.

The best smoked beer I have had. Very good balance.

Bottiglia 0,5 l. Marrone scuro, bella schiuma beige, sentori affumicati, malto, tabacco. Molto beverina, corpo medio, bassa carbonazione, molto equilibrata. In bocca carne affumicata, tabacco, finale corto.

Bottle 0,5 
Pours clear, dark brown colour with a medium beige head. Smokey ( I love this word ) with the aromas of smoked meat, wood, caramelised malts and tobacco. Kinda reminds me of "Tabasco chiplotle ". Medium bodied and nicely balanced. On the palate it tastes like it smells. Almost like a barbecue with the Chipotle sauce. Nice smokey aftertaste with a light bitterness.

Bottle from HO1K. Pours a clear dark brown with a thin off white ring. Strong aroma of smoked ham. Clingy with oily lacing. Taste is thin and watery with the smoked ham flavor that lingers. Would have been better if more robust like a porter or stout. OK, but not something I would drink often.

UPDATED: MAY 8, 2017 clear mahagony liquid, tan head. Aroma of tarred wooden skiis, pea soup with smoked pig leg, bacon. Taste same, medium sweet, light bitter, light sour. Light body, light feel, average carb, long smoky fin
Dark brown color with big brown head. Smokey aroma, somewhere between wood and meat, with some malty notes. Taste is salty. Full palate aroma. Really awesome smoked beer.

Bottle @ home
Clear ruby brown, brown head
Rich smoked ham/bacon, nuts
Again smoked bacon/ham, astringet after, bitter pleasent finish, woody

Smoked ham, briny, no sweetness, a little bitter on the aftertaste. Dark brown, a little auburn tint, tan head. Did not like on the first sip, but kind of grew on me about half way through. I might enjoy this with a nice grilled steak and salad.

Aroma: the smokiness is more wood than ham; pleasant, even if it almost completely overshadows any other aroma that there might be.
 Appearance: dark brown, clear, head large, beige, and relatively stable.
 Taste: a little more sweet then bitter, just very slightly sour.
 Palate: body full; carbonation soft; finish astringent, sweetish; mouth feel a little foamy.
 Overall: very nice. Just very nice.

Bottle.

A- Ham, smoky.

A- Dark burgundy brown color, clear dark liquid, beige head.

T- Ham, smoky, umami, wood, char.

P- Medium body, average texture, average carbonation, 

O- Ya like ham? Well then youll like this. Like liquid ham. A bit of brininess and smoke to bring it all together. A very savory beer. Would be good to use in a recipe. Ham and bean soup maybe?
A naso prevale laffumicato, ma anche caramello, miele di castagno. Non aggressiva in bocca. Da provare alla birreria di Bamberg.

Aroma: ham, smoky, caramel, bread
Taste: light sweet, bread, caramel, ham, smoky
Great one
UPDATED: JAN 7, 2016 La rauchbier per eccellenza. Ottima per pasteggiare con carne ed affumicati vari. Un classico senza tempo-- rated with beerbasher/winphone

Clear Amber pour with a thin beige head .... Aroma of smoked meats and caramel malts like peated malts but different .... Taste is of smoked oak, caramel malts, like smoked meats .... Has some light bitter notes ... Just a perfect compliment to a meat or bacon meal ... Less campfire more smoked meats so on the better end smoke wise to me ... Excellent

Botella. Color casi negro. Clara. Mucha espuma. Aroma a arenque ahumado. En boca es muy parecido al té ahumado: el Lapsang Souchong. Es un estilo muy distinto que te tiene que gustar para apreciarlo. A mí me gusta.
Darkbrown beer with brownisch head. Aroma of smoke ham, brown sugar and honey. Complex taste, smoky, bitter and sweet with average carbonation. Really special and enjoyable. I love it.

Nez délicieusement fumé, boisé, bois brûlé, fumée qui sen dégage.
Robe limpide cuivre et Ruby.
Corps assez léger, fluide, alcool en retrait, multiples parfums de bois, de fumée et de céréales.

Extra.
Pours a dark brownish-red with a thin white head. Aroma is smoky, tobacco, barbecue. Flavor is caramel, smoke, and barbecue. Has a light, crisp body. Very good.
0,5l Flasche. Dunkelbraunes Bier mit beiger Schaumkrone. Es riecht nach Malz und Rauch, schmeckt nach Rauch, Kaffee, Malz...recht komplex, trotzdem angenehm süffig und lecker!

Glas directly from the tap at the brewery in Bamberg, where the beer went over the counter as fast as it could be drawn from the barrel. No surprise: its a must-try when visiting Bamberg. Very dark brown with brownish head, it smells and tastes a lot like smoked ham. There are also aromas of the dark malts with some coffee, maybe honey. Low bitterness, but quite sweet which is an exotic combination with the "ham". Very interesting and very delicious, but I could understand somebody not liking it at all.

Bottle from Tanakaya, shared with family for New Years. Pours a deep brown with a small beige head. Cured, honey ham notes on the nose with some light brown sugar and charcoal notes. Average carbonation with medium to medium light body. Very drinkable for the smoke and refreshing even. Finish is almost spritzy with some dark fruit as it warms. Excellent stuff.

26.12.2015-0,5L-Flasche. Rötlich-schwarz, hellbrauner Schaum.
Aroma kalter Aschenbecher, Malz, Schinken, Antrunk rauchig, malzig. Interessant.

Dark ruby almost cola coloured with light brown foam. Aromas of smoked cured sausage, reminds me of Christmas german markets. Palate, smooth and light, but develops in complexity in the mouth. Taste, Smokey and lingering salty taste, very complex and unusual. Overall, really enjoyable and unique, great for winter night. A beer equivalent of a hot chocolate. Very enjoyable.

Cerveza de color marrón oscuro con una cabeza de color blanquecino. Aroma de humo muy presente, recordándonos al tocino ahumado. Sabor y sensación en la boca al humo, pero no es tan dominante como el aroma sugiere, la malta ofrece un buen equilibro con un poquito de dulzura y un agradable amargor que combina muy bien con el ahumado del acabado. Realmente una buena cerveza.

Flaske. Røgøl er bestemt ikke min kop te, men jeg vil forsøge at bedømme den ud fra hvad man kan forvente af en røgøl. Denne øl er en af de bedre af slagsen. Farven er kastanjebrun og skumkronen er fast. Aromaen er røg(!) og tobak. Smagen er som at drikke et lejrbål og den vedholdende eftersmag er den samme. Denne øl er flydende lejrbål.
500ml Flasche. Klar und kastanienbraun. Minimale Schaumkrone. Intesives Raucharoma nach Schinken. Milder Geschmack.

Flasche 0,5l: Sehr dunkel, schwarz, klar, mittelporiger fester Schaum; sehr würzige Nase mit kräftiger Rauchnote, Schinkenspeck, Räucherfisch; im Körper sehr würzig und sehr trocken, kräftige Rauchnote, Schinkenspeck, Räucherfisch, cremig, Kohlensäure, leichte dunkle Fruchtnoten, Röstaromen; rauchig würziger Nachgang

W barwie bardzo ciemne jak na marzena - miedziane; z niską ale drobna kremową pianą. W aromacie bardzo intensywna wędzonka w typie szynkowym, ogniskowym, drzewnym. W smaku dominuje mocna dymność, ale są też i nuty słodowe, może ciut karmelowe. Goryczka dosyć wyraźnie zaznaczona - chmielowa ale w połączeniu z wędzonką sprawiająca nieco palone czy wręcz popiołowe wrażenie. Dosyć mocno wysycone

Tasted from bottle pours a dark ruby with beige head. Aroma is campfire and cured meats. Taste is smoke, caramel, bacon, earthy flavors. Very well done smoked beer. 

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Starke Raucharomen, flüssiger Schinken, extrem malziger Körper, tiefschwarze Farbe mit leicht brauner Krone.
Goût très spécial salé de bacon fumé, très bonne bière dans sa catégorie mais une suffit sinon écoeurante
Helder bruin. Licht crèmekleurige kraag. Geur rook en spek. Smaak rook, spek, hout, kampvuur. Lekker en vrij subtiel.

16.9 oz brown bottle poured into proper glassware.

Appearance: Dark body, tan head with a good lace.

Aroma is smoky sweet

The flavor is meaty & compliments the smell.

Mouthfeel is light on the palate.

Overall this is a great beer that pairs well with barbecued/cured meats, or cheese such as gouda.

0.5L bottle, smoke, smoke, cured meat and smoke. OMG I loved it. Aroma of smoke and caramel, taste smoke, bacon, some sweetness. Medium body and great beer in general. I suppose the beer style which you like or hate. I like it, no I adore it!

Sample from a 50cl bottle (26 IX 2015), shared with De Meetjeslandse Bierproevers. You love it, or you hate it. But lets try to rate this one objectively. This bottle pours a dark, clear brew. The colour is reddish, dark brown, black. The foam is nearly non existing. The nose gives a hint of the smoked beer: Roasted malts, bacon, meat. The taste is correspondingly smoked. The carbonation is soft, the beef taste is heavy. I could also notice some wood features, corn, salami. A very strong aroma and a Rauchbier archetype! Therefor, I rate this as a smoked brew - although I really dont like the style.

Bottle. Dark ruby/brown body with a thin beige head. Light lacing. Aroma of heavily smoked malts, bacon, wax and black pepper. Flavour of raisin, Dr Pepper and smoked meat. Thin to medium body with a smooth mouthfeel. Soft fizz. Lots of smoke. Paired well with my brothers homemade beef biltong.

UPDATED: FEB 23, 2017 kran w jabeerwocky. ciemne z bardzo ladna piana. aromaty.. no coz, ewidentnie schlenkerniana wedzonka gra wiekszosc rol, glowna i drugoplanowa... ale w tej wedzonce faktycznie jest cos niesamowitego, w sensie - jest fajna :) w odroznieniu od wielu innych :) moze to placebo i kwestia marki? nie wiem, ale dziala. a poza tym? w tle pojawiaja sie jakies lekkie, kawowe a moze nawet czekoladowe klimaty? smak, poza wedzonka oczywiscie, to slodycz i lekka kwaskowatosc. bardzo fajna, gladka faktura. bardzo dobre.Ocena potraktowana skryptem do przeliczania ocen (uzgodnienie UT/RB).

UPDATED: OCT 4, 2016 A German, smoked Märzen beer. The creamy head soon fades. Smells like smoked salami. Tastes smokey. Lots and lots of smoked oak, and it lingers after the finish. On the downside, not a lot of other flavors make it passed the strong taste and aroma. Body is medium and lightly oily. Best paired with food - can be monotone on its own. Everything from an omelette to a piece of apple pie has worked for me. A decent example of the style.
Update 10/2016. Bumped up by .1
Fantastischer Schaumteppich, farblich dunkelbraun mit leichtem Rotstich. Geruch stark rauchig, nach Schinken. Weich und recht rezent im Trunk, sehr rauchig, Schinkengeschmack. Meisterwerk!

~1 pint bottle, poured into a nonic pint at ~45 degrees F.

Appearance: Pours a deep, clear garnet red, which can but barely be seen through without light on the opposite side of the glass. Forms a couple fingers of slighty-tan head, which dies to a thick ring and cap in short order. Lacing is quite present.

Smell: Heady smoke and ash greet the nose straightaway, redolent with the scent of a campsite in the fall. Greasy, charred meat aromas are also present, as if fresh out of 16+ hours in a low-temperature slow smoker. Beneath the wreath of smoke, a blend of honeyed toast and old leather form a solid malt base.

Taste: Smoked meat, of the pork belly and coldwater fish variety, fills the mouth from the first sip, wrapped in a fluffy, thick layer of campfire ash. Honey-drenched toast manifests more as the beer moves along, from an underlying support to a full partner with the dense, smoky flavor. Leather, polished wood, savory, faint white pepper, and some dark toffee also appear through the middle. The finish is all sweet toast and smoke, leaving the mouth coated and salivating for some proper barbecue.

Mouthfeel: A full-bodied lager indeed.

Overall: You may have heard that Schlenkerla beers have a reputation, as rauchbiers go. It is entirely well-deserved.

Castaño intenso oscuro, aromas ahumadas, trufas, baicon. Sabor balanceado dulce, ácida y un poco salado y muy poco amargo. Retro gusto tostados. Cuando bebes mas desaparece el ahumado y sientes mas las maltas dulces. Muy refrescante y te pide mas. Cuerpo bajo y suave textura.

Very dark brown color with minimal off white foam. Aromas of Lithuanian cured/dried sausage, smoked food? Smells more of meat than malt, but there are hints of malt. Palate, smooth and light, but leaves this like smoked meat and good smoke taste on roof of your mouth, so would say it has long finish, I personaly like it. Taste, of dired and cured meat just like it smells, also malty but watery in a way. Overall really good and interesting beer, although I get sensation like I drink water that leaves the taste afterwards, so as if the beer is okay and quite watery but aftertaste is the main deal here. Recomended!

Clear, ruby brown, rich and lasting beige head, good lacing. Smoky aroma of pit and smoked ham and bisquits. Smoky nites appear in taste backed up by some raisins, bisquits and caramel. Very balanced, excellent beer.

The smell of smoke and, of course, smoked, stand up when the beer, the smell begins to dominate smoked bacon, and its true.
On the palate, too, smoked like eating smoked sausage.
Sweets absolutely no aftertaste pleasant "smoky" bitterness.
This beer is really worth a try, and lovers, and even indifferent, feeling quite unique.

This was poured into a mug.
The appearance was a dark brown color with a cap of an off white foamy head that dissipated within less than thirty seconds messy glazed lacing sticks to the glass.
The smell started off with sweet honey, subtle meats, a little bit of toast, light caramel and rounds out into a sly little bit of breadiness.
The taste was mainly sweet with a subtle balance of the smoked malts and smooth crisp bacon to boot. Theres a light sticky sweet smoke to meaty aftertaste leading into the finish. 
On the palate, this one sat about a light to medium on the body with a fairly decent sessionability about it. Carbonation seemed to be good for the style and for me as its fairly light and smooth. A light dryness does hit my tongue a bit.
Overall, this was a pretty good rauchbier that I would have again. Nice marzen feels underneath.

0,5 l Euro-Flasche aus einem lokalen Getränkemarkt. Dunkle Farbe, schöner Schaum. Im Geruch sehr intensive Raucharomen. Im Geschmack sehr rauchig. Im Nachtrunk leichte Kaffeearomen. Leider nicht mein Fall
